mapper.sql: ws.ht_work_shop_id, ws.work_shop_id, ws.work_shop_code, ws.work_shop_name, ws.work_shop_desc, ws.factory_id, ws.create_user_id, ws.create_time, ws.modified_user_id, ws.modified_time, ws.status, ws.option1, ws.option2, ws.option3
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, sf.factory_name from fantech_imes.smt_ht_work_shop ws LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON ws.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON ws.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_factory sf ON sf.factory_id = ws.factory_id
and ws.work_shop_code like CONCAT('%', #{workShopCode}, '%')
and ws.work_shop_name like CONCAT('%', #{workShopName}, '%')
and ws.work_shop_desc like CONCAT('%', #{workShopDesc}, '%')
and date_format(ws.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by ws.modified_time desc
